import useStats from '../utils/useStats'; import styled from 'styled-components' const StatBlock = styled.div` background:grey; front-size:2rem;` const Stats = ({url}) => { const {stats,loading,error} = useStats(url); if (loading) return

Loading...

if (error) return

Error...

return (

Confirmed:

{stats.confirmed.value}

Deaths:

{stats.deaths.value}

Recovered:

{stats.recovered.value}
) } export default Stats;
